OpenProject 7.3.2

Bug fixes (2)

  • Multi-select values could not properly be selected. This affected for instance work package filters and multi-select custom fields. [#26611]
  • The breadcrumb in the roles and permissions in the administration was not shown properly. [#26563]

Thanks a lot to the community, in particular to Chris Jornlin and Steve Manning for reporting bugs!

For further information on the 7.3.2 release, please refer to the Changelog v7.3.2 or take a look at GitHub.
